content: spring cleaning baskets a simple yet functional basket pattern for the home these baskets work up super fast with chunky yarn and they are perfect for organization inside you will find instructions written in us crochet terms but you must already know the basics of crochet materials needed - super bulky yarn - m crochet hook - yarn needle finished measurements small 4 base medium 5 base large 6 base skill level beginner when you purchase this item you will receive an immediate download link for your pattern it is a pdf file terms of use this pattern is my original design it is for private use only please do not redistribute or resell it in any way if you have any questions please contact me and i will do my best to help to see more of my projects and free diy tutorials visit me on facebook and instagram www instagram com/desertblossomcrafts www facebook com/desertblossomcrafts/ for free patterns visit my blog www desertblossomcrafts com
